Pos:%xyz%

Owner:%owner%

Max.HP:%maxHp%
Max.MP:%maxMp%

Curr MP:%currMp%
P. Atk:%pAtk%
M. Atk:%mAtk%
P. Def:%pDef%
M. Def:%mDef%
Acc:%accuracy%
Evs:%evasionRate%
Crit:%crt%
Dist:%dist%
Atk.Spd:%pAtkSpd%
Cst.Spd:%mAtkSpd%
Walk Spd:%walkSpeed%
Run Spd:%runSpeed%
*Basic*
STR %STR% DEX %DEX% CON %CON%
INT %INT% WIT %WIT% MEN %MEN%
